beer.name: Maiden Peak Pale Ale
beer.description: This presidential brew is a beer thatÂ takes note of the change of power.Â This new pale on the block comes with new ideas in grist formulationin the way of it's constituents: biscuit, caramel, chocolate, and carafoam malts.Â It is equally represented by bipartisan hop additions of noble and Yakima valley hops.Â Cheers to change.
